titles.title: Protect Public Use of Public Lands Act
Protect Public Use of Public Lands Act
A bill to release certain wilderness study areas in the State of Montana.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 115-502.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Protect Public Use of Public Lands Act
This bill releases the West Pioneer, Blue Joint, Sapphire, Middle Fork Judith, and Big Snowies wilderness study areas in Montana from further review for designation as wilderness.
